0111011101011001 0000101000010010 0 -> sum: 1000000101101011, cout: 0

0101001101001010 0011011001000011 1 -> sum: 1000100110001110, cout: 0
0110100110111010 0101000110101011 1 -> sum: 1011101101100110, cout: 0
0000000000000100 1101100011110011 1 -> sum: 1101100011111000, cout: 0
1101000101101010 1011010110100000 0 -> sum: 1000011100001010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
